description:
Luffy sets his sights on a showdown with Doflamingo in a desperate attempt to save Law`s life. Sanji, Nami, Chopper, and Brook are attacked by a very deadly foe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La confrontation. Le Chapeau de Paille contre le Démon Céleste !
Ryouyuu Aimamieru! Mugiwara to Ten Yasha
Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!
Встреча двух сильнейших соперников. Мугивара и Небесный Дьявол
لقاء غريمين كبيرين! قبّعة القشّ والشّيطان السّماويّ!
両雄相まみえる! 麦わらと天夜叉
